author: randyk
msg: Record change to Request/Request.xs to open uploaded files in binary mode.

author: randyk
msg: In searching for a suitable Apache2 installation,
- don't look at removeable drives (otherwise, one is prompted
to insert a disc, if it's empty).
- include the parent directory of an Apache.exe in the PATH,

author: randyk
msg: In trying to find a suitable Apache.exe on Win32,
- check also in the PATH environment variable
- don't search on drives corresponding to floppy discs, CDROMS, etc.

author: randyk
msg: Open uploaded files with binary mode, so as to properly get sizes
on platforms like Win32 where it makes a difference.
